venue.address_1: 200 North Dartmouth Mall, Smith Mills, MA
venue.name: North Dartmouth Mall

item.description: http://www.meetup.com... Visit us on facebook too for pictures, videos and more! http://www.facebook.c.... We will be doing another sign wave this Saturday March 3rd. We had 50 at our last event in Seekonk, MA and hope to double it this weekend. We'll be at intersection of Route 6 and Faunce Corner Road starting at 11am. Please come by if you can and show some love for Dr. Paul!
item.name: Ron Paul Sign Wave - North Dartmouth, MA
